00022 #ifndef ADJHOMHILOCELLISTENER_H
00023 #define ADJHOMHILOCELLISTENER_H
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/CelListener.h"
00028 #include "chipstream/ChipSummary.h"
00029 #include "chipstream/HomHiLoCelListener.h"
00030 #include "chipstream/ProbeListFactory.h"
00031 #include "chipstream/ProbeSet.h"
00032 //
00033 #include <cstring>
00034 #include <string>
00035 #include <vector>
00036 //
00037 
00038 /**
00039  * @brief Class for computing hilo qc metric from a cel set of cel files.
00040  */
00041 class AdjHomHiLoCelListener : public ChipSummary, public CelListener {
00042 
00043 public:
00044 
00045   /** 
00046    * Constructor.
00047    * @param probeSets - Vector of probesets to compute metric on
00048    */
00049   AdjHomHiLoCelListener(std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &randProbesets, 
00050                         std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &set1Probesets,
00051                         std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &set2Probesets,
00052                         std::string randLabel,
00053                         std::string set1Label,
00054                         std::string set2Label,
00055                         double k = 2.0f, 
00056                         double emThresh = 0.05f, 
00057                         double binSize = 0.02f, 
00058                         std::string label = "adj-minhilo",
00059                         double hiLoDiffCutOff = 2.0f,
00060                         double hiLoFailedValue = 0.0) :
00061       m_RandProbesets(randProbesets), 
00062       m_Set1Probesets(set1Probesets), 
00063       m_Set2Probesets(set2Probesets),
00064       m_LabelRand(randLabel),
00065       m_LabelSet1(set1Label),
00066       m_LabelSet2(set2Label),
00067       m_K(k), 
00068       m_EmThresh(emThresh), 
00069       m_BinSize(binSize),
00070       m_Label(label),
00071       m_HiLoDiffCutoff(hiLoDiffCutOff),
00072       m_HiLoFailedValue(hiLoFailedValue) { 
00073 
00074         m_RandHiLo = new HomHiLoCelListener(m_RandProbesets, randLabel);
00075         m_Set1HiLo = new HomHiLoCelListener(m_Set1Probesets, set1Label);
00076         m_Set2HiLo = new HomHiLoCelListener(m_Set2Probesets, set2Label); 
00077 
00078         declareMetric(m_Label,ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00079         
00080         declareMetrics(m_RandHiLo->getMetricDefs());
00081         declareMetrics(m_Set1HiLo->getMetricDefs());
00082         declareMetrics(m_Set2HiLo->getMetricDefs());
00083   }
00084   
00085   /**
00086    * Virtual destructor.
00087    */
00088   virtual ~AdjHomHiLoCelListener(){
00089       delete m_RandHiLo;
00090       delete m_Set1HiLo;
00091       delete m_Set2HiLo;
00092   }
00093 
00094   /** 
00095    * Process another cel files worth of data.
00096    * @param cel - Filehandle to open cel file.
00097    */
00098   void newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel);
00099 
00100   /** 
00101    * Get the names for the cel files that have been seen.
00102    * @return - vector of cel file names, one for each cel file in order seen.
00103    */
00104   std::vector<std::string> getCelNames() {
00105     return m_CelNames;
00106   }
00107 
00108 protected:
00109 
00110   /// Vector of probesets to compute HiLo on
00111   /// Pointer memory is owned elsewhere...
00112   std::vector<ProbeListPacked> m_RandProbesets;
00113   std::vector<ProbeListPacked> m_Set1Probesets;
00114   std::vector<ProbeListPacked> m_Set2Probesets;
00115   /// HomHiLoCelListeners for underlying metrics
00116   HomHiLoCelListener *m_RandHiLo;
00117   HomHiLoCelListener *m_Set1HiLo;
00118   HomHiLoCelListener *m_Set2HiLo;
00119   /// Labels for the underlying HiLo listeners
00120   std::string m_LabelRand;
00121   std::string m_LabelSet1;
00122   std::string m_LabelSet2;
00123   /// Name of the cel files that have been called.
00124   std::vector<std::string> m_CelNames;
00125   /// Our K parameter for the contrast centers transformation.
00126   double m_K; 
00127   /// EM Threshold to use
00128   double m_EmThresh;
00129   /// Size of contrast bins
00130   double m_BinSize;
00131   /// Label for the chip summary output
00132   std::string m_Label;
00133   /// Cut-off for when to use rand vs set to m_HiLoFailedValue
00134   double m_HiLoDiffCutoff;
00135   /// Value to report when the cutoff is not meet
00136   double m_HiLoFailedValue;
00137 };
00138 
00139 #endif /* ADJHOMHILOCELLISTENER_H */
